name: PesoExchanger
0:
”Alexa, ask peso exchanger current rate”
”Alexa, ask peso exchanger what's today rate”
”Alexa, ask peso exchanger how much is a peso today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peso exchanger
des:
This Alexa skills gives you the most up to date exchange rate for Mexican Pesos to US Dollars.

Exchange rate provided by this Alexa skill is presented solely for information purposes.
The exchange rate fluctuate from time to time, and accuracy is not assured through this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
